message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to us, I propose a price of $95 for it. This allows us both to find a fair compromise. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time. I'm interested in making a deal, but I'm only comfortable paying $85.  This would allow us both to benefit and finalize a transaction. Let me know your thoughts.
